column5: Comfortable single family home. THERE WILL BE 2 CATS IN THE HOUSE WHO USE A PET DOOR AND GO IN AND OUT. Approximately 25 miles from NRG Center; less than 5 miles to NASA Johnson Space Center and Space Center Houston; 5 miles to Kemah Boardwalk. Approximately 30 miles to Galveston Beach.
column8: Single family League City, TX available SUPER BOWL
